skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have a solid foundation in HTML and CSS, which I use to create well-structured and visually appealing web pages. My skills extend to responsive design, ensuring that my websites are accessible and functional across various devices and screen sizes. Additionally, I am well-versed in web accessibility principles, allowing me to build inclusive digital experiences for all users. Currently, I am expanding my expertise by learning React, a powerful JavaScript library for building dynamic and interactive user interfaces. This new endeavor is enhancing my ability to develop modern web applications with improved performance and usability.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Although I have not yet had the opportunity to work on the backend of a project, I am proficient in both Java and C++. I have undertaken diverse projects that have honed my skills in object-oriented programming, allowing me to design and implement robust and efficient software solutions. My experience with these languages has given me a strong understanding of fundamental programming concepts, such as inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. This background provides a solid foundation for future exploration into backend development, where I am eager to apply and expand my knowledge.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: My main experience with UI and UX design spans several platforms, including MATLAB applications, JavaFX, and web development. In MATLAB, I have created user-friendly interfaces for various engineering and scientific applications, focusing on functionality and ease of use. With JavaFX, I have developed desktop applications that emphasize both visual appeal and user interaction. In web development, I have combined HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to craft engaging and responsive user experiences. These diverse experiences have equipped me with a versatile skill set in UI and UX design, allowing me to create intuitive and effective interfaces across multiple environments.

skills.title: Data Science
skills.description: I have experience in performing statistical analysis using the R language, which has been instrumental in my work with bioinformatics. R's extensive libraries and packages enable me to handle and analyze large datasets effectively, applying various statistical methods and visualizations. My work in bioinformatics involves analyzing genetic data, interpreting results from high-throughput sequencing, and using R to develop models that can predict biological outcomes. This experience has honed my skills in data manipulation, statistical modeling, and the visualization of complex data sets, contributing to a deeper understanding of biological processes and improving research outcomes.

testimonial.description: I've had the pleasure of working with Humberto on several projects during our time in university. Their proficiency in various programming languages, including Python, C++, and Java, is impressive. Humberto stands out not only for their technical skills but also for their creativity and ability to think outside the box. Their contributions always bring a fresh perspective to the team, making our projects both innovative and effective.

Humberto is an exceptional computer science student with a strong grasp of programming languages like MATLAB, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Their recent work with React has shown their adaptability and eagerness to learn new technologies. Beyond their technical skills, Humberto excels in team environments. They are a natural leader who can delegate tasks efficiently, ensuring that the team works cohesively and meets deadlines without compromising on quality.

Having collaborated with Humberto on several university projects, I can confidently say they are one of the most creative and technically skilled individuals I know. Their expertise in a wide range of programming languages and their ability to apply this knowledge effectively in team settings is remarkable. Humberto's leadership skills are unparalleled; they delegate work with precision and always foster a collaborative atmosphere, which significantly enhances the team's productivity and morale.
